com.revo.deployr.client.factory

Class RTaskFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revo.deployr.client.factory.RTaskFactory

  • public class RTaskFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory to simplify the creation of Discrete, Pooled and Background RTask instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RTask backgroundTask(java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String taskDescription, java.lang.String codeBlock, BackgroundTaskOptions options)
      Create an instance of a BackgroundTask for an analytics Web service based on an arbitrary block of R code.
      static RTask backgroundTask(java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String taskDescription, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String directory, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String version, BackgroundTaskOptions options)
      Create an instance of a BackgroundTask for an analytics Web service based on a repository-managed R script.
      static RTask backgroundTask(java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String taskDescription, java.net.URL externalURL, BackgroundTaskOptions options)
      Create an instance of a BackgroundTask for an analytics Web service based on a URL-addressable R script.
